vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in EtherBank.withdrawBalance (patch_8.sol#15-26):
	External calls:
	- ! (msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_8.sol#21-23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_8.sol#25)

vulnerability_findings.message:

	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
